text: Bearwallow is an unincorporated community in Henderson County, in the U.S. state of North Carolina. ==History== A post office called Bearwallow was established in 1858, and remained in operation until 1951. The community derives its name from a bear wallow near the original town site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Henderson County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Bearwallow, North Carolina
